## OWebService.getRelationItem() method

Gets a single item relation for a given entity id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRelationItem<R>(id: string, relation: string): OWebXHR<OApiGetRelationItemResponse<R>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The entity id. |
|  relation | string | The relation name |

<b>Returns:</b>

OWebXHR&lt;[OApiGetRelationItemResponse](./oweb.oapigetrelationitemresponse.md)<!-- -->&lt;R&gt;&gt;
